key.name: brightness-buckets
key.description: Array of brightness buckets defining how screen brightness responds to ambient light. Each tuple contains: (minimum_lux, maximum_lux, brightness_level). Brightness level is 0.0-1.0 (0-100%). Ranges can overlap to provide hysteresis effect.

key.name: keyboard-backlight-buckets
key.description: Array of bucket indices where keyboard backlight should be enabled. By default, keyboard backlight is enabled for the first two buckets (Night and Very Dark to Dim Indoor). If empty, keyboard backlight is disabled.

key.name: keyboard-idle-timeout
key.description: Time in seconds of user inactivity before the keyboard backlight is turned off to save power. The backlight will automatically turn back on when user activity is detected in low light conditions.
